title: The Asset Allocator: BeFi-Bewildered Advisors
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: A recent study commissioned by Charles Schwab and conducted by Cerulli Associates aims to help financial advisors incorporate behavioral finance into their practices. This podcast (5:50) argues that while behavioral finance provides interesting research opportunities for academics, the field remains something of a nothing-burger for most clients. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
